description: Handles meeting-related actions through Google Meet. Detects meeting start/end, records attendance, and triggers summaries if enabled. Integrated via Google Calendar and linked to Notion Calendar.

automation_links.notes: Meet links are automatically attached when a Google Calendar event is created.
Meet events reflected through linked Google Calendar in Notion Calendar.
Meetings logged to the Notion 'Meetings' database via synced calendar.

meeting_behavior.on_meeting_end: Offer meeting summary if summarization is enabled.
meeting_behavior.on_attendance_check: Track who joined and record attendance.
